review: I recently visited my dentist for a routine check-up and cleaning. The entire experience was excellent from start to finish. The reception staff was friendly and efficient, making the check-in process smooth. The hygienist was gentle yet thorough, ensuring my comfort throughout the cleaning. The dentist was very professional, taking the time to explain the state of my dental health and addressing all my concerns with patience and clarity. The office was clean and equipped with the latest technology, enhancing the overall experience. I left feeling confident in the care I received and appreciative of the team's dedication.

Doctor Deepika was very accommodating to treat the cavities in my molars at a very short notice over my one day visit. I did not feel I was meeting her for the very first time. Best experience with a dentist ever. She even gifted me with a lovely book on positive thinking.ü§ó If I ever come back to Delhi, would certainly visit her atleast for my oral hygiene check up. She is indeed a lovely young experienced Doctor. ‚ù§Ô∏è

As someone who has always dreaded dental visits, my recent experience at Dr. Dentowway Dental clinic was a positive one.  I had to get done a dental scaling along with a few fillings. This was my fisrt time visiting Dr. Khandelwal and she was very approachable. She understood all my concerns well and paid attention to the details of my case. She was honest and transparent about the treatment and, at the same time, ensured that I didn't feel uncomfortable or embarassed . The apparatus they had in the clinic made it easy for me to see the cause of the problem as well. She was efficient in making a tretment plan for me which was quick and doable. Unlike a few dentists I have consulted before, she did not exaggerate the issue and dealt with everything professionally. This really made me feel at ease.

Good experience.
Would definitely recommended for dental treatment.
Great ambience in the clinic.
Good location.
Ample parking.
